info.name: Area postrema
info.description: The area postrema is a small elevated area near the obex in the fourth ventricle. It is one of the circumventricular organs that lacks a blood-brain barrier. Functionally, it is a chemoreceptive area associated with vomiting.
info.item: /Gross/Brain stem & Cerebellum/Brain stem/8 Brain stem - dorsal view
